channel.title: (Delta) Need command help! (317) rep++

item.title: (Delta) Need command help! (317) rep++
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Hey guys, Ive got a question.

I was working on a command witch sets a int to 1. That works fine except i want the command to write the Playername to a file.

I created the file named “promoted” in config.

I added the command :

if(command.startsWith("promote") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String name = command.substring(7); sM("You just promoted someone!"); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.promoted = 1; writeLog(p.playerName, "promoted"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

and it gives me a error :

Client.java:8015:int cannot be dereferenced
writeLog(p.playerName, “promoted”);
^

Could someone say why this happen and how i add it correct? Thank you.

Youridudock

Read full topic
